core.game

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.game.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Event>

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Event>
    Created by diego on 24/03/14.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int activeId
      Sprite id of the object that triggers the event (either the avatar, or something created by the avatar).
      boolean fromAvatar
      True if the avatar triggered the event, false otherwise (example: something that is thrown by the avatar hits a sprite).
      int gameStep
      Game step when the event happened.
      int passiveId
      Sprite id of the object that received the event (what did the avatar, or something created by the avatar, collided with?).
      Vector2d position
      Position where the event took place.

    • Field Detail

      • gameStep

        public int gameStep
        Game step when the event happened.

      • fromAvatar

        public boolean fromAvatar
        True if the avatar triggered the event, false otherwise (example: something that is thrown by the avatar hits a sprite).

      • activeId

        public int activeId
        Sprite id of the object that triggers the event (either the avatar, or something created by the avatar).

      • passiveId

        public int passiveId
        Sprite id of the object that received the event (what did the avatar, or something created by the avatar, collided with?).

      • position

        Position where the event took place.
